name: Siddhant Satam
summary: I am a graduate in the field of Computer Science. A full-time chronic learner and a part-time dreamer. I am exploring the world through thought experiments, esoteric literature, tech analysis, and the great outdoors. I have a proven track record of academic and leadership excellence. Throughout the course of my academics, I have acquired the skills and experience to own and take projects from inception to production on an individual level or a team basis.
